japanese: わあ……！
translation: Wow...!

japanese:
これは見事だな。
名前の通りの景色だ。
translation:
This is amazing.
It's just as the name suggests.

japanese: ええ、まさにエメラルドビーチです！
translation: Yes, it's definitely Emerald Beach!

japanese:
しかし透明度がすさまじい……。
海の中までクッキリ見えてるぞ。
translation:
But really, the transparency is incredible...
You can see right into the sea.

japanese:
こんなに綺麗な海があるんですね。
いつまでも見ていられそうです。
translation:
I had no idea there was such a beautiful ocean.
I could look at it forever.

japanese: でも――
translation: But%p-2;――

japanese: ん？　なんで靴を脱いだ？
translation: Hm? Why did you take your shoes off?

japanese:
それはもちろん、見ているだけなんて
もったいないからですよ。
translation:
Well, of course, just watching isn't enough.
That's so wasteful.

japanese: あっ、おい！？
translation: Ah, hey?!

japanese: ちょっと冷たいですが、やっぱり気持ちいいです！
translation: It's a bit cold, but it still feels good!

japanese:
お前……。
濡れちまうぞ？
着替えの用意もないってのに。
translation:
Itsuki...
You'll get wet, won't you?
And you don't have any spare clothes.

japanese:
大丈夫です。
ほんのちょっと足を入れているだけなんですから。
translation:
It's okay.
I'm just putting my feet in a little bit.

japanese: 上杉君も一緒にどうですか？
translation: How about you, Uesugi-kun? Do you want to join me?

japanese:
俺はいい。
ズボンが濡れそうだし。
translation:
I'm good.
My pants'll get wet.

japanese:
それはもったいないですよ！
小さなことは気にしないで行きましょう。
translation:
What a waste!
Let's not worry about the little things like that.

japanese:
ズボンなんて、
万が一、濡れてしまってもすぐ乾きますよ。
translation:
As for your pants,
even if they get wet,
they'll dry in no time.

japanese:
……まあ、そこまで言うなら。
ちょっと待ってろ。
translation:
...Well, if you put it that way.
Just wait a moment.

japanese:
（靴を脱いで、裾をまくって……。
　よし、これなら濡れる心配はなさそうだ）
translation:
(I'll take off my shoes
 and roll up my cuffs...
 Alright, it looks like I won't get wet.)

japanese: まあ、ちょっとだけなら。
translation: Alright, maybe a little.

japanese: ありがとうございます！
translation: Thank you!

japanese: なんの礼だよ。
translation: Why thank me?

japanese:
あはは……。
実は、私だけはしゃぐのも
少し恥ずかしくはあったので。
translation:
Ahaha...
Actually, it's a little embarrassing
being the only one to let loose like this.

japanese:
はは、そういうことか。
仕方ねぇな、一緒にはしゃいでやる。
translation:
Haha, is that so.
Can't be helped. I'll frolic with you.

japanese:
（靴を脱いで、裾をまくって……。
　これで準備完了だ）
translation:
(I'll take off my shoes
 and roll up my cuffs...
 Right, now I'm ready.)

japanese: ああ、楽しまないともったいないよな。
translation: Okay, it would be a shame to not enjoy it.

japanese:
ええ、せっかくですから！
砂浜の感触も海の冷たさも
ここでしか楽しめませんし。
translation:
Yes, while we've got the chance, right?!
You can't experience the feeling of the sand
and the coldness of the sea anywhere else but here.

japanese:
そうだな。
よし――
translation:
That's right.
Okay then%p-2;――

japanese:
（靴を脱いで、こうして裾をまくりあげときゃ、
　濡れる心配もねぇし……行くか！）
translation:
(I'll take off my shoes
 and roll up my cuffs like this,
 so I won't get wet... Here we go!)

japanese:
うおっ！？
意外に冷てぇな！
translation:
Whoa!
It's surprisingly cold!

japanese: でも気持ちいいでしょう？
translation: But it feels good, doesn't it?

japanese: ああ、やっぱ入ってよかった――
translation: Yeah, I'm glad I went in after all%p-2;――

japanese: えいっ。
translation: Take that!

japanese:
あっ、おい！？
水かけるなって、濡れるだろ！
translation:
Hey, what the hell?!
Don't splash me, I'll get wet!

japanese:
細かいことを気にしてはダメですよ！
ほらっ！
translation:
Don't worry about the little things!
Yah!

japanese: こんの……やりやがったなぁ！
translation: You...you've done it now!

japanese:
足で水をかけるなんてはしたないですが、
せっかくの海ですし、これくらいは許されますよね。
translation:
Splashing water with your feet is kind of rude,
but since we're at the beach, I guess it's okay, right?

japanese: いいや、海が許しても俺が許さねぇな！
translation:
No, even if the sea forgives you,
I won't!

japanese: あっ！　冷たっ！
translation: Ah! That's COLD!

japanese: ふっ、会心の一撃が決まったぜ。
translation: Heh, I landed a clean hit.

japanese:
やってくれましたね！
ええいっ！
translation:
Now you're in trouble!
Raah!

japanese: もうその手は食らわん！　おらぁ！
translation: I won't fall for that trick again! Take this!

japanese: きゃあっ！
translation: Eeeep!

japanese:
くっくっく！
俺を本気にさせたお前が悪い！
translation:
Ha-ha-ha!
It's your fault for making me go all in!

japanese: まだ勝ち誇るには早いですよっ！
translation: It's too early for you to celebrate!

japanese:
うお！？
くっ、こうなりゃ徹底抗戦だ！
translation:
Whoa?!
Alright, I'll fight back with everything I've got!

japanese:
……やっちまったな。
お互いビショビショじゃねえか。
translation:
...Oh, great.
We're both completely soaked now.

japanese: もう、上杉君が張り合ってくるからです。
translation: Well, I only did it cause you challenged me, Uesugi-kun.

japanese:
お前が始めたんだろうが。
俺は応戦しただけだが？
translation:
You're clearly the one who started it.
I just fought back, didn't I?

japanese: どうした？
translation: What's wrong?

japanese:
い、いえ、その……
周りにも観光客の方々がいるのに
気にせずはしゃぎすぎてしまったような。
translation:
N-nothing, um...
I just got a little too excited
and didn't consider the other tourists around us.

japanese: （……た、確かに！）
translation: (...Th-that's true!)

japanese:
（高校も卒業する年だってのに
　水をかけあって遊ぶなんて！
　旅行のテンションって怖ぇな……）
translation:
(We're almost done with high school,
 yet here we are splashing water at each other!
 The pressure of traveling can be tense...)

japanese: 注目されたりは……別にしてないか。
translation: I guess no one's...really paying attention to us.

japanese:
まあ、よく考えたら、みんな旅行中だしな。
自分が楽しむことに集中してるわけか。
translation:
Well, now that I think about it,
everyone else is on vacation too.
They're probably just focused on their own fun.

japanese:
実際、私たちも気にしていませんでしたし、
ここでは誰しも自分たちの世界にいるんでしょうね。
translation:
Yeah, we didn't really notice anyone else
around us either.
I guess everyone is in their own little world here.

japanese: となると……自意識過剰か。
translation:
In that case...maybe we were just being
a little too self-conscious.

japanese:
……はしゃいでいたことよりも、
そちらが恥ずかしくなってきました。
translation:
...I'm starting to feel more embarrassed
about that than anything else.

japanese: おう……。
translation: Yeah...

japanese:
さ、さて！
誰にも見られていないようですし勝負の続きを――
translation:
A-alright!
Since it looks like nobody is watching us,
let's continue our competition%p-2;――

japanese: これ以上濡れるのは勘弁だ！
translation: I don't want to get any wetter than I already am!
